articles.description: Sony has revealed the launch date of its next hardware launch event, over three months after it announced the Xperia 1 V. Sony has also shared a few teasers and camera samples, effectively confirming that we are a week away from the official launch of the Xpe…
articles.content: Sony has now revealed the date of its next product announcement, confirming earlier rumours. While the company has not named the device it intends to release yet, the sole teaser video that it has of… [+1657 chars]
